ai.summary: A short, easy 2.2 km heritage walk along the Lye Town History Trail in the UK, suitable for most ages and fitness levels.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-paved paths with occasional narrow pavements near historic sites. Comfortable footwear recommended for minor uneven sections.
ai.safety_notes: Urban trail safety: watch for road crossings, other pedestrians, and temporary closures. Check the weather, carry water and a charged phone, and stay aware of your surroundings near historical sites.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation on a smartphone
Hat and sunscreen for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; enjoyable year-round with appropriate clothing for colder weather.

seo.title: Lye Town History Trail – Easy 2.2 km Heritage Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the Lye Town History Trail, a short 2.2 km easy walk in the UK. Ideal for families and casual walkers, featuring local heritage sites along flat, well-maintained paths.
seo.h1: Lye Town History Trail – Easy 2.2 km Heritage Walk
